titleStmt.title: An apologie to my Lorde Treasorer touching a speach vttered vnto His Lordship by my Lord of C.
titleStmt.author: Broughton, Hugh, 1549-1612.

notesStmt.note: Pertains to Broughton's controversy with John Rainolds over Biblical chronology.
Reproduction of original in the Christ's College (University of Cambridge.) Library.
